Other – / Check here for information regarding order changes, cancelations, and returns. Here
Your order has been placed.\n An order confirmation mail will now be sent to your registered address. Regarding products being checked by MISUMI Although your order has been placed, it contains some products for which the shipping time and prices, etc., must be confirmed by MISUMI.\n MISUMI will confirm the products as quickly as possible and be in contact. After MISUMI has quickly confirmed the contents, contact will be made via e-mail or via a message displayed on the computer.\n If a message is displayed, please check its contents before taking action. Some of the products are being confirmed by MISUMI. Regarding order changes, cancelations, and returns Click [Here] for information regarding product changes, cancelations, and returns. [Here] Order Information Example of a message from MISUMI (full site) Return to Cart Return to Quote

Shipping Options Group products together for shipping (Products will be grouped together for shipping to take place on the latest shipping date) Ship products as soon as they are ready (Products will be shipped individually in the order of their shipping date)

As business hours have ended, the order will be finalized on the following business day. Business hours are from 8 A.M. to 8 P.M.\n If the order is placed as-is, be sure to check the shipping date and price using the Order History. For Your Information · A cash-on-delivery fee will be incurred separately in the case of cash-on-delivery orders.\n· When placing an order by pressing the "Finalize Order" button, customers are agreeing to "Regarding Order Changes and Cancelations" and "Terms of MISUMI-VONA Services." · A cash-on-delivery fee will be incurred separately in the case of cash-on-delivery orders.\n· Please be aware that the quote amount and order amount may differ depending on changes to sales tax rates, conditions, etc. Please check before proceeding. · When placing an order by pressing the "Finalize Order" button, customers are agreeing to "Regarding Order Changes and Cancelations" and "Terms of MISUMI-VONA Services". · Please be aware that the quote amount and order amount may differ depending on changes to sales tax rates, conditions, etc. Please check before proceeding.

This product is out-of-stock and the shipping date must be adjusted. Because an ordered product is out-of-stock, the shipping date for those products will need to be adjusted.\n After checking the following shipping dates, please press the "Send" button. Shipping times and prices, etc., for this product must be confirmed by MISUMI. Shipping times and prices, etc., for this product must be confirmed by MISUMI. Some of the products in the quote require confirmation by MISUMI. \nAfter the quote has been finalized, these products will be confirmed as quickly as possible and you will be contacted by MISUMI.\n If acceptable, please press the "Request Confirmation by MISUMI and Finalize Quote" button. Some of the products in the order require confirmation by MISUMI. \nAfter the order, these products will be confirmed as quickly as possible and you will be contacted by MISUMI.\n If acceptable, please press the "Request Confirmation by MISUMI and Finalize Order" button.

There are contents in the\norder that I would like to confirm. Please select "Finalize Order For Products Except Those to be Confirmed by MISUMI" if you would like confirmation performed by MISUMI.\n Please select "Save All Details as a Quote" to save all details as a quote.
Products to be Checked: Items Unit Price: Quantity: Shipping Time: Subtotal: (Tax Not Included) Subtotal: (Tax Included) Order Products Except Those to be Confirmed Perform Product Settings Again
There are products in the\nquote that I would like to confirm. Press the "Continue with Quote" button.
Please select "Finalize Order For Products Except Those to be Confirmed by MISUMI" if you would like confirmation performed by MISUMI.\n Please select "Save All Details as a Quote" to save all details as a quote. Please inquire to MISUMI regarding the status of the item in question. Working Days: Request a Quote for Products Except Those to be Confirmed
The contents of the quote contain a product which was changed. · Because the deadline for finalization of the order for products other than those being confirmed by MISUMI has passed, the prices of products for which Express T was selected have changed. · Orders placed after 6 P.M. in which Express T was selected will be handled the following day. · The discount will be applied when orders for products in which Express A was selected are made by 3 P.M. · Because the deadline (3 P.M.) for the Express A early order discount has passed, the prices of products for which Express A was selected have changed. · Orders placed after 6 P.M. in which Express A was selected will be handled the following day.
Continue With Order Perform Product Settings Again
Next-day Shipping (Express A) Information Products are included whose price will change depending on the time in which the order is placed. Create a quote using prices in which the Express A early order discount (orders placed before 3 P.M.) are applied. Create a quote using standard Express A prices.
